about_the_game:
This battle will happen soon; a final war where everyone takes part, but only the brave lead the way! "Bulletproof" is more than just a name; it’s the story of humanity! For us, this is our last chance!

"The climate crisis had become an inescapable reality. Global issues like migration, drought, and overpopulation led to wars and critical shortages in food and water worldwide. To solve these problems, humanity developed a top-level artificial intelligence: EARTHCURE. But for a machine, reality is just a matter of numbers. EARTHCURE concluded that, for human survival, 99% of the world’s population had to be eliminated. Using biological weapons to turn humans into zombies, along with new war machines and incubation centers, EARTHCURE drove the world towards mass extinction. A tank left behind by a military team, and one soldier inside... Bulletproof! Although it may seem like chance, this is humanity’s story. This is your story!"

Bulletproof Tank Adventure is a 3D, level-based tank combat game. With combat mechanics and progression through platforms and diverse maps, it delivers intense moments of focus, stress, and action. Bulletproof will make you laugh at times and test your patience!

Game Mechanics

  • Realistic movement experience based on terrain conditions.

  • Action-packed moments of leaping across platforms or landscapes.

  • Challenging cliffs and explosive drops.

  • Survival struggle with precise control settings.

Weapons

  • Three types of bombs with unique abilities.

  • Machine gun.

  • Close combat weapons specially designed for zombies.

Maps

  • Challenging terrains and courses.

  • Muddy areas that make navigation difficult.

  • Volcanoes, lava flows, and geysers.

  • Desert environments, tornadoes, fog, and more.

Music

  • Music tailored to scenes and levels.

Content

  • Time-challenged platforming and maps.

  • Hints.

  • Dynamic gameplay experience.

  • Personalized settings.

  • Customizable graphics options.

  • Low storage requirements.

  • Seven different tank types.

  • Thirty color options.

  • Unique characteristics for each tank.

Enemies

  • Tanks of different types and features.

  • Zombies.

  • Vehicles equipped with machine guns.

  • Vehicles with smart missiles.

  • Booby traps.

  • Mines, mine showers.

  • The EARTHCURE robot and more.

In this journey, we’re incomplete without you. Joining us will shape the ending of this story. Your thoughts and support are valuable to us, and knowing we’re not alone on this journey makes all the difference.

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, tanks, guns, zombies, explosions, falling and blood effects in the form of 3D lowpoly are used. It is recommended that sensitive parents take the necessary precautions in these matters.

name: Bulletproof Tank Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD Ryzen 5 2400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p Resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11, 10
  • Processor: Quad core 4Ghz+ from 2020 or newer
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU with 4 GB VRAM - GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, Radeon RX 570, Intel Arc
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: High resolution, High quality compression

short_description: In a post-apocalyptic world, engage in a thrilling 3D tank battle game, fighting zombies and AI robots. Navigate challenging terrains with your tank and defeat enemies using powerful weapons. A struggle for strategy, danger, and survival awaits you!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
